titles: A mastif vvhelp and other ruff-island-lik currs fetcht from amongst the Antipedes Which bite and barke at the fantasticall humorists and abusers of the time.
author: Goddard, William, fl. 1615.
publisher: By George Waters], and are to bee sould, where they are to be bought,
notes: The imprint is fictitious: printed 1616? by George Waters in Dordrecht (STC).
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
